Introducing Apple Watch Series 4. A watch with a completely new design and new technologies. They help you lead an even more active lifestyle

STARTING A NEW LIFE 

Introducing Apple Watch Series 4. A watch with a completely new design and new technologies. They help you stay active
column6:
stay healthy and stay connected. 

CHANGES THAT CHANGE EVERYTHING 

Largest display in the Apple Watch lineup. New electrical heart rate sensor. Enhanced Digital Crown with tactile feedback. So familiar and at the same time fundamentally new Apple Watch Series 4 changes all ideas about the capabilities of the watch. 

FEEL. TAKE CARE. PROMPT 

Alerts for too low and too high heart rate. Fall detection and emergency call functions. New dials ""Breath"". This watch is designed to protect you and help you lead a healthier life. 

AT THE PEAK WITH YOU 

Automatic training recognition. New types of training: yoga and hiking. Advanced features for runners such as cadence and pace alerts. At the same time
column7:
you can display up to five indicators on the screen to accurately track your statistics. 

MOTIVATION. MOTIVATION. MOTIVATION 

A new type of competition: one on one. The ability to share activity indicators with friends. Personal coaching tips. Monthly motivational goals. Virtual awards for achievements. Everything to inspire you to close your Activity rings every day. 

EVERYTHING IMPORTANT AT YOUR HAND 

Walkie
column8:
phone calls and messages. Music from Apple Music and Apple's Podcasts app. New app experience with Siri shortcuts. So many important and necessary things - right on your wrist.

Mobile phones";"Apple iPhone 7 smartphone was launched in September 2016. The phone comes with a 4.70-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 750x1334 pixels at a pixel density of 326 pixels per inch (ppi) and an aspect ratio of 16:9. Apple iPhone 7 is powered by a";"

Apple iPhone 7 smartphone was launched in September 2016. The phone comes with a 4.70-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 750x1334 pixels at a pixel density of 326 pixels per inch (ppi) and an aspect ratio of 16:9. 

";"

Apple iPhone 7 smartphone was launched in September 2016. The phone comes with a 4.70-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 750x1334 pixels at a pixel density of 326 pixels per inch (ppi) and an aspect ratio of 16:9. Apple iPhone 7 is powered by a 2.34GHz quad-core Apple A10 Fusion processor. It comes with 2GB of RAM. The Apple iPhone 7 runs iOS 10 and is powered by a 1960mAh non-removable battery.

column1: As far as the cameras are concerned
column2: the Apple iPhone 7 on the rear packs a 12-megapixel camera with an f/1.8 aperture. The rear camera setup has phase detection autofocus. It sports a 7-megapixel camera on the front for selfies
column3: with an f/2.2 aperture.

column1: Apple iPhone 7 based on iOS 10 and packs 32GB of inbuilt storage. The Apple iPhone 7 is a single SIM (GSM) smartphone that accepts a Nano-SIM card. The Apple iPhone 7 measures 138.30 x 67.10 x 7.10mm (height x width x thickness) and weighs 138.00 grams. It was launched in Black

column4: Matte Black

column6: Rose Gold

TO ALL THE LOVE OF POWERFUL TECHNOLOGY 

iPad Air gives you access to Apple's most advanced designs. A12 Bionic processor with Neural Engine. 10.5"" Retina display with True Tone technology. Support for Apple Pencil and Smart Keyboard. Plus
column8:
iPad Air weighs less than 500g so you can easily carry it with you. 

EVERYTHING YOU NEED. NO WEIGHT 

Despite the large 10.5-inch Retina display
column9: iPad Air is very compact. It is great for solving a variety of tasks literally on the go. To do this

as well as a battery that lasts up to 10 hours without recharging. That's almost a whole day.

AT ONCE

watch your favorite series online. And do it all at the same time. 

SUPER-FAST GRAPHICS FOR GAMES AND APPS

photorealistic graphics in 3D games - the 4-core graphics system of the A12 Bionic processor is behind it all. 

EVERYTHING IS DONE BEAUTIFUL

increased brightness and anti-reflective coating help to ensure the highest quality image. 

TRUE TONE. EASY ON THE EYES IN ANY LIGHT 

True Tone technology automatically adjusts white balance based on ambient light. Therefore
column23:
the image on the display looks more natural and comfortable for the eyes in any conditions - both during the evening reading and when you paint a sunny landscape in the open air. 

Keep in touch. SHOT IN HD. PLAY AR

scan and immediately send documents. And even create your own worlds - iPad Air cameras work great with augmented reality technologies (augmented reality).

iPad is the perfect device for living in augmented reality.

and add comments to them.

you can use your favorite applications at the same time - just select them from the Dock. And files can be moved from one application to another and sorted in the Files app in any way you like. 

ALL YOUR FILES HAVE BEEN GONE 

The Files app lets you work with content that can be stored on your iPad Air

your files will always be available - easy and simple.

column1: Apple iPhone 12 is housed in an aluminum case with flat side edges. The entire front panel is occupied by a beautiful 6.1-inch OLED display with Super Retina XDR technology. This smartphone introduces for the first time a completely new coating technology - Ceramic Shield. It is glass with nano-inclusions of transparent ceramics
column2: which make it incredibly durable. Now you can not be afraid to drop your smartphone - the probability of breaking the screen when falling is now less than 4 times.

column1: Apple iPhone 12 is powered by the most powerful new generation A14 Bionic chip. The overall performance of the smartphone has increased by 40% compared to the previous model. The 4-core graphics accelerator is 30% more powerful
column2: and the improved 16-core Neural Engine is 10 times faster than its predecessor. At the same time
column3: the power consumption of the new processor has decreased. This smartphone will perform any applications
column4: any operations without the slightest delay. The iPhone 12 now makes it possible to execute the most complex algorithms of processing and machine learning
column5: best seen in the incredible capabilities of its cameras.

column1: iPhone 12 received two cameras: wide-angle and ultra-wide-angle. Apple's excellent cameras have received an upgrade this year with improved imaging technology. Night mode is now supported for both modules. This means shots taken in low light will be more detailed and sharper. In addition
column2: you can now shoot a time-lapse in night mode. The new smartphone can shoot video in HDR 4K mode in the Dolby Vision standard
column3: which is an absolute record not only among smartphone cameras
column4: but also among many professional camcorders.

column1: Gadgets/Watch;"Apple Watch 4 Silver";470.00;apple-watch-4-silver;1;;0;0;0;Apple;;;;0;1;0.00;;;"Apple Watch 4 Silver";"Apple Watch 4 Silver
column2: Apple
column3: Watch";"Introducing Apple Watch Series 4. A watch with a completely new design and new technologies. They help you lead an even more active lifestyle
column4:
better monitor your health and always stay in touch.";"

Introducing Apple Watch Series 4. A watch with a completely new design and new technologies. They help you lead an even more active lifestyle
column5:
better monitor your health and always stay in touch.

";"

STARTING A NEW LIFE 

Introducing Apple Watch Series 4. A watch with a completely new design and new technologies. They help you stay active
column6:
stay healthy and stay connected. 

CHANGES THAT CHANGE EVERYTHING 

Largest display in the Apple Watch lineup. New electrical heart rate sensor. Enhanced Digital Crown with tactile feedback. So familiar and at the same time fundamentally new Apple Watch Series 4 changes all ideas about the capabilities of the watch. 

FEEL. TAKE CARE. PROMPT 

Alerts for too low and too high heart rate. Fall detection and emergency call functions. New dials ""Breath"". This watch is designed to protect you and help you lead a healthier life. 

AT THE PEAK WITH YOU 

Automatic training recognition. New types of training: yoga and hiking. Advanced features for runners such as cadence and pace alerts. At the same time
column7:
you can display up to five indicators on the screen to accurately track your statistics. 

MOTIVATION. MOTIVATION. MOTIVATION 

A new type of competition: one on one. The ability to share activity indicators with friends. Personal coaching tips. Monthly motivational goals. Virtual awards for achievements. Everything to inspire you to close your Activity rings every day. 

EVERYTHING IMPORTANT AT YOUR HAND 

Walkie
column8:
phone calls and messages. Music from Apple Music and Apple's Podcasts app. New app experience with Siri shortcuts. So many important and necessary things - right on your wrist.
